item.title: Taha add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Taha add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Taha add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "We are not necessarily doubting that God will do the best for us; we are wondering how painful the best will turn out to be." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Taha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Every day I remind myself that my inner and outer life are based on the labors of other men, living and dead, and that I must exert myself in order to give in the same measure as I have received and am still receiving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Taha add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "We are all worms, But I do believe that I am a glow worm." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Taha add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Never, never, never give in!" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Taha add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Taha add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Taha add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you are going through hell, keep going." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Taha add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill
